title: Mala Margarita
source: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
categories: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
ingredients: - Mala Spice Mix (this page) for rimming the glass
- 1 to 2 oz / 30 to 60ml mezcal or tequila
directions: 1. Coat the rim of a tall glass with the spice mix. Fill the glass with ice and set aside.2. In a cocktail shaker, combine the mezcal, orange liqueur, lime juice, simple syrup, and a couple ice cubes. Shake well for about 10 seconds.3. Strain the margarita through a fine-mesh sieve into the prepared glass, garnish with the lime wedge, and enjoy!
